Interface Operation<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - expression type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Expression<T>, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanOperation, ComparableOperation, DateOperation, DateTimeOperation, DslOperation, EnumOperation, GeometryOperation, JTSGeometryOperation, JTSLineStringOperation, JTSPointOperation, JTSPolygonOperation, LineStringOperation, NumberOperation, OperationImpl, PhraseElement, PhraseElement, PointOperation, PolygonOperation, PredicateOperation, QueryElement, QueryElement, SimpleOperation, StringOperation, TermElement, TermElement, TimeOperation, WindowOver, WithinGroup

    public interface Operation<T>
extends Expression<T>
    Operation represents an operation with operator and arguments
